languages.text: {n}Воздух в помещении пронизывает дикая смесь из машинных и биологических миазмов. Кровь, ржавчина, рвота, машинное масло, экскременты, керосин — все запахи смешиваются в такой густой смрад, что он кажется почти осязаемым.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Воздух в помещении пронизывает дикая смесь из машинных и биологических миазмов. Кровь, ржавчина, рвота, машинное масло, экскременты, керосин — все запахи смешиваются в такой густой смрад, что он кажется почти осязаемым.{/n}

languages.text: {n}The air in the room is permeated by a wild mixture of miasmas of both mechanical and biological origin. Blood, rust, vomit, machine oil, excrement, kerosene — all these smells blend together into such a thick stench that it almost feels palpable.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Воздух в помещении пронизывает дикая смесь из машинных и биологических миазмов. Кровь, ржавчина, рвота, машинное масло, экскременты, керосин — все запахи смешиваются в такой густой смрад, что он кажется почти осязаемым.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The air in the room is permeated by a wild mixture of miasmas of both mechanical and biological origin. Blood, rust, vomit, machine oil, excrement, kerosene — all these smells blend together into such a thick stench that it almost feels palpable.{/n}

{n}The air in the room is permeated by a wild mixture of miasmas of both mechanical and biological origin. Blood, rust, vomit, machine oil, excrement, kerosene — all these smells blend together into such a thick stench that it almost feels palpable.{/n}

{n}The air in the room is permeated by a wild mixture of miasmas of both mechanical and biological origin. Blood, rust, vomit, machine oil, excrement, kerosene — all these smells blend together into such a thick stench that it almost feels palpable.{/n}

{n}The air in the room is permeated by a wild mixture of miasmas of both mechanical and biological origin. Blood, rust, vomit, machine oil, excrement, kerosene — all these smells blend together into such a thick stench that it almost feels palpable.{/n}

languages.text: {n}房间里的空气弥漫着机械与生物各种混合在一起的味道。血液、铁锈、呕吐物、机油、排泄物、煤油……所有的气味混合在一起，散发着浓烈的臭味，你仿佛都能触碰得到这要命的味道。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The air in the room is permeated by a wild mixture of miasmas of both mechanical and biological origin. Blood, rust, vomit, machine oil, excrement, kerosene — all these smells blend together into such a thick stench that it almost feels palpable.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}房间里的空气弥漫着机械与生物各种混合在一起的味道。血液、铁锈、呕吐物、机油、排泄物、煤油……所有的气味混合在一起，散发着浓烈的臭味，你仿佛都能触碰得到这要命的味道。{/n}

languages.text: {n}El aire de la sala está impregnado de una mezcla espantosa de miasma de origen mecánico y biológico. Sangre, óxido, vómito, aceite para máquinas, excrementos y queroseno... todos estos aromas se mezclan para crear una peste tan espesa como para ser casi tangible.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The air in the room is permeated by a wild mixture of miasmas of both mechanical and biological origin. Blood, rust, vomit, machine oil, excrement, kerosene — all these smells blend together into such a thick stench that it almost feels palpable.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El aire de la sala está impregnado de una mezcla espantosa de miasma de origen mecánico y biológico. Sangre, óxido, vómito, aceite para máquinas, excrementos y queroseno... todos estos aromas se mezclan para crear una peste tan espesa como para ser casi tangible.{/n}

languages.text: {n}その部屋の空気は、機械や生物の両方から出る瘴気が自然に混じり合って立ち込めていた。血、錆、嘔吐物、機械油、排泄物、灯油―それらの臭いが全て混ざりあっており、もはや触れることができそうなほど濃い悪臭になっている。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The air in the room is permeated by a wild mixture of miasmas of both mechanical and biological origin. Blood, rust, vomit, machine oil, excrement, kerosene — all these smells blend together into such a thick stench that it almost feels palpable.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}その部屋の空気は、機械や生物の両方から出る瘴気が自然に混じり合って立ち込めていた。血、錆、嘔吐物、機械油、排泄物、灯油―それらの臭いが全て混ざりあっており、もはや触れることができそうなほど濃い悪臭になっている。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Luft im Raum ist durchzogen von einer wilden Mischung von Gerüchen mechanischen und biologischen Ursprungs. Blut, Rost, Erbrochenes, Maschinenöl, Exkremente, Kerosin – all das verbunden zu einem so kompakten Gestank, dass man ihn fast anfassen könnte.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The air in the room is permeated by a wild mixture of miasmas of both mechanical and biological origin. Blood, rust, vomit, machine oil, excrement, kerosene — all these smells blend together into such a thick stench that it almost feels palpable.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Luft im Raum ist durchzogen von einer wilden Mischung von Gerüchen mechanischen und biologischen Ursprungs. Blut, Rost, Erbrochenes, Maschinenöl, Exkremente, Kerosin – all das verbunden zu einem so kompakten Gestank, dass man ihn fast anfassen könnte.{/n}

languages.text: {n}L'air ambiant est saturé d'un mélange confus de miasmes d'origine mécanique et organique. Sang, rouille, vomissures, huile moteur, excréments, kérosène... Tous ces effluves se mêlent en une puanteur à couper au couteau.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The air in the room is permeated by a wild mixture of miasmas of both mechanical and biological origin. Blood, rust, vomit, machine oil, excrement, kerosene — all these smells blend together into such a thick stench that it almost feels palpable.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}L'air ambiant est saturé d'un mélange confus de miasmes d'origine mécanique et organique. Sang, rouille, vomissures, huile moteur, excréments, kérosène... Tous ces effluves se mêlent en une puanteur à couper au couteau.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Odayı dolduran havaya hem makinelerden hem de canlılardan yayılan ağır, tiksindirici bir koku sinmiş. Kan, pas, kusmuk, makine yağı, dışkı, gaz yağı... Tüm bunlar bir araya gelerek âdeta elle tutulacakmışçasına yoğun, pis bir kokuyu meydana getiriyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The air in the room is permeated by a wild mixture of miasmas of both mechanical and biological origin. Blood, rust, vomit, machine oil, excrement, kerosene — all these smells blend together into such a thick stench that it almost feels palpable.{/n}
